snippet: Forced to play its home matches on foreign soil because of continuing violence, Syria’s soccer team advanced to the playoffs for an Olympic berth with a victory over Malaysia on Wednesday.
abstract: Syria's men's soccer team, forced to play its home matches on foreign soil because of continuing violence in the country, advances to the playoffs for an Olympic berth with a victory over Malaysia.
lead_paragraph: Forced to play its home matches on foreign soil because of continuing violence, Syria’s soccer team advanced to the playoffs for an Olympic berth with a victory over Malaysia on Wednesday.

headline.seo: With Syria Embroiled in Unrest, Olympic Team Keeps Its Focus for a Day
headline.main: As Syria Deals With Unrest, Olympic Team Keeps Its Focus for a Day
headline.print_headline: With Syria in Turmoil, Olympic Team Keeps Its Focus

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
